summary: Payment service p99 latency above threshold
description: CloudWatch alarm: p99 latency for payment-service exceeds 2000ms. Occurs during peak checkout hours. Need to investigate DB queries and external gateway calls. Initial trace shows slow queries on orders table.
steps_to_reproduce: 1. Enable detailed logging on payment-service. 2. Trigger 100 concurrent checkouts. 3. Capture p99 from CloudWatch Metrics. 4. Correlate with slow query log in RDS.

summary: Idempotency key collision under high load
description: Duplicate payment attempts when same idempotency key used within 1s. Race condition in payment-service idempotency store. Causes double-charge in edge cases.
steps_to_reproduce: 1. Send two POST /payments with same idempotency key within 500ms. 2. Verify only one charge in ledger. 3. Under load, second request sometimes returns 200 and creates duplicate.

summary: Rating API returning 500 for discount rules
description: POST /rating/quote returns 500 when discount rules contain null effective_date. Stack trace in rating-service discount engine. Affects bulk quote requests from partner API.
steps_to_reproduce: 1. POST to /rating/quote with discount rule where effective_date is null. 2. Observe 500 and NPE in rating-service logs. 3. Valid effective_date returns 200.

summary: Discount calculation wrong for multi-tier policies
description: Premium discount not applied correctly when policy has multiple tiers. Calculation uses wrong tier index in rating-service. Finance validated with sample policies.
steps_to_reproduce: 1. Create policy with 2 tiers and a discount rule. 2. Call rating API and compare premium to manual calculation. 3. Tier 2 discount is applied to wrong tier.

description: Policy lookup returns outdated coverage after policy update. TTL on Redis cache may be too long or invalidation missing in policy-service. Reported by 3 customers in 24h.
steps_to_reproduce: 1. Update a policy (e.g. add coverage). 2. Within 5 minutes, fetch policy by ID via API. 3. Response sometimes missing new coverage until cache TTL expires.

summary: Policy lookup timeout in API gateway
description: Policy validation calls from API gateway time out after 5s. policy-service P95 latency increased to 4.2s. Check DB and dependency calls. Gateway timeout set to 5s.
steps_to_reproduce: 1. Call policy validation from API gateway during peak. 2. Measure latency and timeout rate. 3. Compare policy-service P95 to gateway timeout threshold.
